settings.title: Introducing the QISS System!
settings.content:
Welcome to my free online ExQISSite Quilt series! Using Paulines QISS system (Quilting Is Sew Simple) you will have the confidence to be an amazing quilter – no matter what level you are at in your quilting journey. My desire is to teach quilters to not be intimidated by the quilting process. We’re going to start you off basic and build you up, so you are a beautiful quilter using our QISS system on your regular sewing machine – keep it simple, it’s very easy to do. 

 

Once you learn my Controlled Quilting and Quilt As You Go techniques, you will find you do not have to worry about any of the stressful things that are involved with free motion quilting or traditional techniques. I would love to have you come along on the journey with us so we can QISS you – Quilting is Sew Simple with the QISS System!  

 

~Pauline

settings.title: Are you intimidated by quilting a large quilt?
settings.content:
Join Pauline's free online series to make the ExQISSite blue and white quilt featuring Pauline’s Quilting Is Sew Simple (QISS) System!  

Learn how to quilt without free motion quilting, one block at a time. Whether you’re a seasoned quilter or a complete beginner, this series is designed for you.

In the video tutorials, you’ll learn how to quilt simple yet beautiful designs on a domestic sewing machine and join your quilted blocks seamlessly with Pauline’s unique Quilt As You Go (QAYG) techniques. 

Pauline will guide you step-by-step, building your skills and confidence so you can quilt with ease. 

 Throughout the series, you’ll gain the knowledge and techniques needed to create your own quilt from start to finish and achieve the stunning look of a traditional quilt—your friends won’t believe it’s made with Quilt As You Go techniques! 

 Join Pauline for a fun, supportive atmosphere where Quilting is Sew Simple with the QISS System!

settings.title: The ExQISSite Blue & White Quilt
settings.content: Learn how to create a stunning blue and white ‘ExQISSite’ Quilt using Pauline’s Quilt As You Go and Controlled Quilting techniques, without the stress of free motion quilting.

settings.content: Join our mailing list today to stay up to date with all things Linda's!
